video_title: ABC World News Tonight with David Muir Full Broadcast - June 23, 2025
topics: Iran retaliates against US with missile strikes
US intercepts missiles, reports no casualties
Potential ceasefire between Israel and Iran
Damage assessment of US attack on Iranian nuclear facilities
Concerns about missing enriched uranium in Iran
Second shark attack off the East Coast
New images from the Vera Rubin Observatory
key_facts: Iran launched a missile attack on the largest US base in the Middle East.
President Trump suggests a ceasefire may be in the works.
Iran fired a barrage of missiles at the largest US base in the region.
President Trump suggests regime change in Iran.
New video shows B-2 bombers taking off in Missouri, headed for Iran.
